name: You are a Spider
description:
You are a Spider.

Build webs/hunt prey/scare your humans.

Each action will take you ''one'' hour.

There are ''nine'' hours till midnight.

Try to stay alive for 5 days (dont forget to eat).

This game was made in twine as a first project, after completing a two day workshop in 'interactive fiction' at the British Library. 

If you find any bugs (heh heh) or have any comments or suggestions please leave a comment below ad I will try to get back to you as soon as...
